plugins.author: 3ch01c
plugins.name: Replace player names with more easily remembered names
plugins.description: Show resonator energy percentage on resonator energy bar in portal detail panel.

plugins.author: 3ch01c
plugins.name: spam-filter
plugins.description: This is a spam filter plugin which filters out SPAM from Comm messages.

plugins.author: 57Cell
plugins.name: 57Cell's Field Planner
plugins.description: Plugin for planning fields in IITC

plugins.author: 633KYN35D with significant code from EisFrei
plugins.name: Inventory Parser
plugins.description: Parse Inventory from Ingress

plugins.author: Artoria2e5
plugins.name: Highlight almost-8 portals
plugins.description: Find portals that are 1/2/3 resonators to level 8. Makes its own requests; use with caution.

plugins.author: BlancLapin
plugins.name: Advanced Tracker Player
plugins.description: Advanced version of Player Tracker

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Backup/restore all data
plugins.description: With this plugin you can backup all your localstorage data, so you can save it to a text file, and you can also restore all data. This can be usefull to transfer your settings to another device, or to make a backup before reinstalling IITC. You can also view or delete stored data.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Bannergress: Add-on
plugins.description: Add a lot of extra non-standard functionality. Read the About info for all details. Filters for Done and To-Do banners, on the Map and Browse page (Sign in required). Filter Offline or Online banners from the Browse list. !!! Be aware that using these Plugin Filters will transfer very large amounts of Bannergress data !!!

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: OpenCycleMap.org map tiles add-on
plugins.description: Add-on to set an API KEY for the Thunderforest map tiles (OpenCycleMap). To make things easier, the Add-on already includes the code from the OpenCycleMap plugin.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Bookmarks add-on
plugins.description: Bookmark plugin add-on, to replace the default yellow marker by a color marker (color change requires colorpicker or drawtools), and show bookmark names (layer), including optional scaling. Modified export file with timestamp in text/plain format. Also an option for bookmarks export to kml file format (for google maps). Add/remove bookmarks with filters for level, faction, captured, visited and resonator counts. Integrated Spectrum Colorpicker 1.8.1

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Cells areas at portal level
plugins.description: Show the S2 cells areas on the map at portal zoom level. A tiny area instead of a score region. Also shows larger S2 cells when zooming out. Using geoJson instead of geodesicPolyline.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Console log
plugins.description: Display the Console log in a window, captures console.log and console.warn. Execute Javascript commands with the eval field, results are displayed with JSON.stringify formatting

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Date and time
plugins.description: Show date and time on the map, configurable time formatting, select a manual timezone, or automated timezones with your free GeoNames account.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Drone route planner
plugins.description: Plan a route for your drone (manually), draw your route between portals in range. Mark hacked portals. Use the drone half range layer to see if portals are within range. Import/export data functions available. Integrated Spectrum Colorpicker 1.8.1

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Favorite portal details
plugins.description: Quickly show a list of details for your favorite list of portals.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Filter Comms for MU and more
plugins.description: Filter the 'all' comms pane, options to show only created Control Fields and their MUs, filter for capture, deploy, link, destroy or drone actions, filter faction or public chat, or filter all actions by faction

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Font awesome integration
plugins.description: Font awesome: Get vector icons and social logos on your website with Font Awesome, the web's most popular icon set and toolkit (https://fontawesome.com/ using source: https://www.bootstrapcdn.com/fontawesome/).

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Free Styler
plugins.description: This plugin gives you free choice to style colors and opacity for portals, links (width) and fields, including the new Machina portals and links.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Goto Ingress intel link
plugins.description: Instead of clicking a link you can copy/paste any URL into IITC with this Goto Intel Link plugin. Support for portal links, map/perma links, mission links, and also support for portal and mission links created in the Ingress Prime scanner.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Highlight Resonator Owners
plugins.description: Highlight portals with resonators by owner

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: History Highlighters
plugins.description: Highlighters to make use of captured history data. Highlighters to hide all or only all captured portals, with or without ENL and RES portals. Requires CORE subscription

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: imageOverlay
plugins.description: Place an image on the map, to help draw field art

plugins.author: @Chyld314 @DanielOndiordna
plugins.name: IMATTC
plugins.description: Ingress Mission Authoring Tool Total Conversion, adding categories for missions, show banner preview, export json, download images, and more.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Keep all data
plugins.description: Use the layer selector to toggle Keep all portals and Keep all links, to keep all out of view portals and links loaded (be aware that currently destroyed links are not removed when these options are switched on)

plugins.author: EisFrei - fork by DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Live Inventory
plugins.description: Show current in-game inventory. Requires CORE subscription. Fork by DanielOnDiordna https://github.com/DanielOndiordna/IngressLiveInventory extras: menu buttons, refresh feedback, portals list key count, capsule view, keys in capsule view on portals, zoom keys, draw bookmarks.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Load more COMMS history
plugins.description: Load more COMMS history without scrolling back, usefull for other plugins

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Maps Route Planner
plugins.description: Plan a route with multiple portals and open Google Maps (max 9 waypoints) or Apple Maps (iOS 16+ supports waypoints) to start your navigation.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Missions add-on
plugins.description: Add-on to add extra functionality for the missions plugin (up to version 0.3.0): 1: Optionally search for all missions within visible range, not just the top 25 (be aware: using this option will increase your server requests). 2: Sort the loaded missions by title (including roman numbers). 3: Show and remove stored missions. 4: Selected mission color changed to red. 5. Displayed missions show filled start portal. 6. Banner view for stored missions. 7. Transfer missions (export/import). 8. Missions routes layer can show a colorful path. 9. Redraw opened missions after IITC reloads.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Mobile improvements
plugins.description: Add some improvements for IITC mobile, such as a close button for the portal details/info screen, a full screen button.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Onscreen Portal Details
plugins.description: Show portal info about resonators and mods for the selected portal directly on the map.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: pan control add-on
plugins.description: Change Pan Control to pan whole screens

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Player Tracker add-on
plugins.description: Add-on to the player tracker plugin: Adjust history limit of 3 hours to another value. Toggle name labels, last action time, toggle/adjust player colors, focus on players, display 1 single player. Integrated Marker Label plugin and Spectrum Colorpicker 1.8.1 plugin. Supports Machina U̶͚̓̍N̴̖̈K̠͔̍͑̂͜N̞̥͋̀̉Ȯ̶̹͕̀W̶̢͚͑̚͝Ṉ̨̟̒̅' player.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Portal History Support for all IITC versions (with cache)
plugins.description: With this plugin the Portal History will be implemented into all versions of IITC. This plugin injects functionality from the IITC-CE release (version 0.32.0) plus extra modifications into all IITC versions (IITC.me / IITC-CE 0.31.1). Code will be injected into the IITC core. History results are cached and re-used automatically. Details from your COMMS captured portals are loaded automatically. Portal history requires CORE subscription.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Portals list add-on
plugins.description: Add-on to only display portals for visible/enabled layers, a fix for Unclaimed/Placeholder Portals, added level filters and load portal details.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Quick Draw Links
plugins.description: Quickly draw and move links from portal to portal on the map. Show crosslinks, for links on the map, as well as for drawn links. Store/Restore your projects. Added great circle support. Added fields layer. Export list of used portals with link count. Integrated Spectrum Colorpicker 1.8.1

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: See More
plugins.description: See more portals and links when zooming out: zoom level all links changes to all portals, zoom level links>300m changes to all links. Beware: This plugin will cause slightly more data usage when zooming out.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Show smaller portals
plugins.description: Show smaller portals when zooming out.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Team bookmarks
plugins.description: Easily add or remove bookmarks for all portals within visible range per team. This plugin requires the Bookmarks plugin and optionally the Bookmarks add-on (to enable color bookmarks).

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Toilet locations
plugins.description: Show public toilet locations in The Netherlands (using data from hogenood.nl)

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Unfreeze button
plugins.description: Display an Unfreeze button, to use in case of IITC app hang after using zoom on mobile devices.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Unique Portal History
plugins.description: Show your personal unique portal history for Visited, Captured or Scout Controlled portals with layers. Choose your own colors for Resistance, Enlightened, Machina and Neutral portals. Place bookmarks. Invert results! Add three extra Portals List plugin columns. Does not require CORE subscription.

plugins.author: DanielOnDiordna
plugins.name: Zoom Override
plugins.description: Override the portal and links display levels for every zoom level. Using this method can cause more bandwidth usage when showing more details at higher zoom levels.

plugins.author: EisFrei
plugins.name: Portal History Flags
plugins.description: Shows Visited/Captured/Scouted status above portal markers

plugins.author: GMOogway
plugins.name: Map layers from GAODE by GMOogway
plugins.description: Add autonavi.com (China) map layers by GMOogway

plugins.author: GMOogway
plugins.name: Local Storage Manager
plugins.description: LocalStorageManager plugin by GMOogway.

plugins.author: Guschtel
plugins.name: Ingress Inventory Overview (based on Ingress Live Inventory from Freamstern)
plugins.description: View inventory and shows portals you have keys from

plugins.author: Jormund
plugins.name: Poly Counts 2
plugins.description: Counts portals by level and faction inside polygons or search result.

plugins.author: Loskir
plugins.name: Draw Tools Replace Portal
plugins.description: Quickly replace one portal with another in Draw Tools

plugins.author: MaxEtMoritz
plugins.name: Copy PokeNav Command
plugins.description: Copy portal info to clipboard or send it to Discord in the format the PokeNav Discord bot needs.

plugins.author: MaxEtMoritz
plugins.name: Glympse
plugins.description: View a Glympse tag directly on the Intel map.

plugins.author: Hevne
plugins.name: ImageOverlay2
plugins.description: Add an image to your map.

plugins.author: McBen
plugins.name: KMLImport
plugins.description: Import KML/GPX/Geojson/TCX into DrawTools

plugins.author: McBen
plugins.name: PLink
plugins.description: Enhance Portal Links

plugins.author: NvlblNm
plugins.name: Pogo Tools w/ PoGOHWH
plugins.description: Pokemon Go tools over IITC. Support in #tools-chat on https://discord.gg/niawayfarer

plugins.author: NvlblNm
plugins.name: Wayfarer Planner
plugins.description: Place markers on the map for your candidates in Wayfarer.

plugins.author: Perringaiden
plugins.name: Hide portals that aren't fully deployed.
plugins.description: Hides any portal that doesn't have 8 resonators.

plugins.author: Perringaiden
plugins.name: Fielded Link Radius
plugins.description: Defines the area inside which a portal can link under a field.

plugins.author: Perringaiden
plugins.name: Hide portals that aren't linked or fielded.
plugins.description: Hides any portal that doesn't have a link or field from it.

plugins.author: Perringaiden
plugins.name: Highlight field anchors that need recharging
plugins.description: Use the portal fill color to denote if the portal needs recharging and how much. Yellow: above 85%. Orange: above 50%. Red: above 15%. Magenta: below 15%.

plugins.author: Tarsi210
plugins.name: Draw Best Link Star
plugins.description: Build the best link star in an area.

plugins.author: VE6SRV
plugins.name: dronerange
plugins.description: Shows drone flight distance between portals

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Bring Portals To Front
plugins.description: Bring the portals layers to front. Prevents that fields and drawn items cover them, making them unclickable.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Chat Message Length
plugins.description: Counts the chat message characters.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Check Point Timer
plugins.description: Add to the sidebar a countdown timer to next checkpoint.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Decay Calculator
plugins.description: Estimate the portal decaying.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Destroyed Links Simulator
plugins.description: Simulate the destruction of portal links: hide its links and fields.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Draw tools plus
plugins.description: Edit and improve Draw tools.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Emoji Chat
plugins.description: Add Emoji support and append an Emoji Keyboard.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Fake Message Location
plugins.description: Set a location. The COMM messages you send will have the setted location.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Font Awesome
plugins.description: Add Font Awesome Icons.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Free Sidebar
plugins.description: Reduces use of sidebar.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Hide UI Zaso
plugins.description: Hide all UI for screenshot.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Last Action Timestamp
plugins.description: Estimate the portal decaying.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Layers Profiles
plugins.description: Saves the current enabled layers (base, overlays and hightlighter). Restore it just a click.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Link Prolongation
plugins.description: Create link prolongations.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: LocalStorage Manager
plugins.description: Manage LocalStorage: import, export and delete.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Logs Diary
plugins.description: Storage favorite logs.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Minify Some Portals Details
plugins.description: Minify some Portal Details in sidebar: mod slots and resonators info

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Player Ranges
plugins.description: Add one or more player markers and his ranges (hack/deploy range and xmp ranges) on the map.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Pocket Portal Details
plugins.description: Append a pocket box containing some restricted details of the selected portal.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Portal Hack Range
plugins.description: Add a circle around the portals to show the range where you can hack the portal.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: Scroll Sleep
plugins.description: A control to enable/disable the zoom map by scroll mouse.

plugins.author: Zaso
plugins.name: To Do List
plugins.description: Add a To Do List.

plugins.author: azrael-42
plugins.name: Drone Helper
plugins.description: Display area drone can "see" from currently selected portal. Manually record if drone has visited portals

plugins.author: birkett83
plugins.name: Landgrab
plugins.description: A mini-game based on ingress and IITC

plugins.author: blsmit5728
plugins.name: Direct Link
plugins.description: Direct Link

plugins.author: blsmit5728
plugins.name: Under-Field Throw Range
plugins.description: Shows under field throw range at 500m

plugins.author: Eccenux
plugins.name: Short portal info
plugins.description: Shows small box with a basic portal information. This is similar to mobile info.

plugins.author: Heistergand
plugins.name: Fan Fields 2
plugins.description: Calculate how to link the portals to create the largest tidy set of nested fields. Enable from the layer chooser.

plugins.author: itayo
plugins.name: Ingress Maxfields
plugins.description: Exports portals in the format for http://www.ingress-maxfield.com/ and allow direct transfer to site

plugins.author: jaiperdu
plugins.name: Custom Google map
plugins.description: Add a customizable Version of Google map tiles as a base layer.

plugins.author: jaiperdu
plugins.name: Cache visible portals
plugins.description: Cache the data of visible portals and use this to populate the map when possible

plugins.author: jaiperdu
plugins.name: COMM Filter Tab
plugins.description: Show virus in the regular Comm and add a new tab with portal/player name filter and event type filter.

plugins.author: jaiperdu
plugins.name: Dialog List
plugins.description: List open dialogs in the sidebar

plugins.author: jaiperdu
plugins.name: Glify layer
plugins.description: GL layer

plugins.author: jaiperdu
plugins.name: Highlight uniques captured/visited/scanned
plugins.description: Highlighter for unique visited/captured/scout controlled portals

plugins.author: jaiperdu
plugins.name: Ingress Icons
plugins.description: Bring ameba64/ingress-items icons into IITC

plugins.author: jaiperdu
plugins.name: Default base maps with labels above fields
plugins.description: Print labels as an overlay of intel layer

plugins.author: jaiperdu
plugins.name: MUs Tab
plugins.description: Add a MUs tab scoring the MU

plugins.author: jaiperdu
plugins.name: Player Inventory
plugins.description: View inventory and highlight portals with keys at any zoom. Can be used with the official plugins Keys and Keys on map to show the number of keys on the map.

plugins.author: jaiperdu
plugins.name: Portals pictures
plugins.description: Show portal pictures in a dialog

plugins.author: modkin
plugins.name: Portal Multi Export
plugins.description: Export portals from bookmarks, current view or polygon

plugins.author: mrDinckleman
plugins.name: Aurora Glyph Hack Challenge
plugins.description: Allow manual entry of portals glyphed during Aurora Glyph Hack Challenge. Use the 'highlighter-aurora' plugin to show the portals on the map, and 'sync' to share between multiple browsers or desktop/mobile.

plugins.author: mrDinckleman
plugins.name: Umbra Deploy Challenge
plugins.description: Allow manual entry of portals deployed during Umbra Deploy Challenge. Use the 'highlighter-umbra' plugin to show the portals on the map, and 'sync' to share between multiple browsers or desktop/mobile.

plugins.author: Kofirs2634 aka Nerotu
plugins.name: Portals Gallery
plugins.description: Creates the gallery of portals that can be used to solve the First Saturday passcode.

plugins.author: Wintervorst
plugins.name: L19 Cells for Ingress
plugins.description: Highlights level 19 cells where portal limit is reached, in order to see where you would best submit new candidates

plugins.author: Wintervorst
plugins.name: S2 Cell Drawer
plugins.description: Allows drawing of s2cells and creates a layerselected hook

plugins.author: Wintervorst
plugins.name: Portal submitrange
plugins.description: Shows the 'too close' radius of existing portals, in order to see where you can search for and submit new candidates

plugins.author: xMAXIMx
plugins.name: Agent profile link
plugins.description: Adds agent profile link in search bar of IITC

plugins.author: xMAXIMx
plugins.name: Scanner link-copy
plugins.description: Adds scanner link (copy mode) to IITC

plugins.author: xMAXIMx
plugins.name: Scanner link
plugins.description: Adds scanner link to IITC

plugins.author: xificurk
plugins.name: Seznam map tiles
plugins.description: Seznam map tiles.

plugins.author: xificurk
plugins.name: Highlight unique visits/captures using opacity
plugins.description: Use stroke and fill opacity to denote player's unique visits and captures. Requires uniques plugin.

plugins.author: xificurk
plugins.name: show uniques visit/captures based on GDPR game_log
plugins.description: Show uniques visit/captures based on GDPR game_log

plugins.author: xificurk
plugins.name: Unique visits/captures heatmap
plugins.description: Display heatmap of all portals that the player did NOT visit/capture.

plugins.author: Zetaphor
plugins.name: Ingress Portal CSV Export
plugins.description: Exports portals to a CSV list
